div.p: Are you interested in making battery life great on devices that are used by millions of people? Do you enjoy solving challenging problems? Do you have passion to use advanced signal processing and machine learning techniques to auto analyze data? If this describes you, we would love to hear from you!

ul.li: Strong coding skills, preferably in C/C++/Objective C
Familiarity with signal processing and statistical data analysis techniques
Strong analytical thinking to solve challenging problems
Self-motivated and able to work independently
Excellent spoken and written communication skills

div.p: We're looking for a motivated engineer with excellent programming, problem solving and communication skills. In this role, you’ll collaborate with domain experts in the team to develop and enhance tools used to analyze power on iOS and MacOS devices. To be successful in this role, you must have good systems understanding, experience with power analysis and familiarity with statistical and large data analysis techniques.
B.S., M.S., or Ph.D. in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent
Preferred skills and experience: • Experience with development on embedded platforms • Good understanding of operating system concepts
